summary: iOS developer with experience building iOS applications (Swift) and full-stack development. Proficient with CocoaTouch, Foundation, Alamofire, CoreData, Realm, REST APIs, Firebase, and agile processes (GitFlow/Jira Scrum). Experienced in back-end (PHP, Java), front-end (AngularJS/BackboneJS), data analytics (BigQuery), and system monitoring.

experience.title: iOS developer
experience.description: Development of applications for iOS 10,11,12 in Swift according to GitFlow and Jira Scrum. CI experience. Using CocoaTouch, Foundation, Alamofire, XIBs, Storyboards, CoreData, Realm, etc. Publishing to App Store. Integration with back-end REST API, Firebase and other Google services.

experience.title: Full stack developer
experience.description: Development of high loaded back-end software on PHP (Symfony, Laravel) and Java (Spring) with PostgreSQL database. Front-end development on AngularJS, BackboneJS, Bootstrap. Data analytics in BigQuery by Google Data Studio. System monitoring by Zabbix, ELK. Mobile Web on Framework7, JQuery Mobile. Mobile bots for WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook.

experience.title: Back-end developer
experience.description: Back-end development on C# (.NET) with MySQL database. System administration and monitoring.

education.degree: IOS and Swift - The complete IOS App development
